patthana16.9:1.1_0: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:1.1_1: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:1.1_2: Abyākataṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho ca naakusalo nasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ appaṭighena tīṇi. Akusalaṁ appaṭighena tīṇi. Abyākataṁ appaṭighena tīṇi.
patthana16.9:2.1_3: Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pannarasa.
